Shade 12 SDK Document

Date:
2011/06/28

Introduction

The Shade Plugin SDK Document contains basic information about developing plugins, class references, and schema definitions. Knowledge of C++ and 3D graphics programming is necessary. For more information about C++ or 3D programming in general, please visit your local library or bookstore.
